long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
MAVA is software solution that provides real-time messaging tips and recommendations, aiming to prevent conflict situations and enhance employee communication, based on our in-house self-trained AI model.

Currently, people are often left to navigate workplace conflicts on their own, relying on personal judgment and involving managers or HRs, what costs USA companies 300B $ yearly and take 7% of employees time.
